title: Anime - Midnight Sex Train (Episodes 1-6)
description:
Hey everyone :)  Giving something back to the community. 

Here&#039;s the only info I could find on this anime:

Plot Summary: In a crowded train, strangers are likely to end up being too close for comfort. But for some people, being too close is a comfort. When a poor conductor witnesses the bizarre yet inviting ritual of anonymous train sex, he jumps on the opportunity toturn it into a business. Every night after the midnight train ends its route, he turns it into a rolling bordello. get ready to climb aboard... the sleazy train is COMING 

PLEASE:

This will be my first of many anime torrents and would love feedback from anyone who downloads it. Whether it&#039;s worthless or not please let me know so I can upload people&#039;s favorites rather then stuff no one wants. 

Also any requests would be appreciated and I&#039;ll do my best to find them for you. Thanks again.
